parser

Class Grammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Grammar

  • public class Grammar
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a grammar. A grammar contains a list of rules, a list of usable symbols, and an axiom (which can be just a symbol or a list of symbols). It also has an attribute "angle" that gives the angle to turn (default is 90°).

    Before using a Grammar, you have to setup the list of usable symbols, the axiom and the list of rules.

    Author:
    xinouch

      The alphabet of the grammar
